about.heading: About Me
about.content: Hello! I'm Dumpala Sai Avinash, a passionate Engineer dedicated to pioneering cutting-edge generative AI projects and crafting agentic AI-based solutions. I thrive on solving complex challenges with creative, innovative strategies. My background spans developing Gen AI and agentic AI systems, designing intelligent IoT solutions, and leading teams on groundbreaking initiatives. As the author of two books and producer of a popular podcast, I embody a commitment to creativity and diverse interests. Please explore my portfolio to learn more about my journey, skills, and accomplishments.

items.title: Sr. Gen-AI Engineer / Solution Architect | Tridiagonal Solutions, Pune
items.description:
OpsEdge: Led development of a multi-agent solution for anomaly detection, root cause analysis (RCA), notifications, and work orders in manufacturing plants, leveraging Python, Neo4j, AWS Bedrock, Claude, LangGraph, and Flask.

Avatar-based Chat using LLMs: Designed architecture for real-time 3D avatar chat that converts voice to text and answers queries using domain-specific PDFs. Integrated Google Speech, Azure Speech, OpenAI GPT-4, LangChain, and Soul Machines.

Insyte-O (Gen AI Maintenance Management): Led a team of five to build an intelligent system for automating maintenance requests, work orders, and planning using AWS Bedrock, Claude, Neptune, OpenSearch, Cognito, S3, and Flask.

items.title: Software Engineer | Youngsoft India Pvt. Ltd. (formerly Ritwik Software Technologies), Hyderabad
items.description:
WPE (Work Posture Assessment): Developed software to calculate ergonomic scores from videos using joint angle analysis and physiotherapist-recommended values. Leveraged Python, OpenCV, Numpy, and AWS.

MFGIIOT (Manufacturing Intelligent IoT): Designed and implemented real-time data collection and analytics for manufacturing plants. Built shopfloor monitors with Ignition and AWS Quicksight dashboards. Used Python, DynamoDB, S3, IoT Sitewise, and MQTT.

items.title: Software Engineer Intern | Youngsoft India Pvt. Ltd., Hyderabad
items.description: Worked on a Databricks POC for smart manufacturing data processing and cloud-based operations. Built Python solutions for processing and analyzing industry data in smart manufacturing contexts.

items.title: Software Engineer Intern | Happy Adda Studios, Bengaluru
items.description: Developed an educational app for government schools in Andhra Pradesh to support self-learning. The app was recognized and showcased at UNESCO’s TECH2019 event in Visakhapatnam.

items.title: Windows App Developer Intern | Skillveri
items.description: Built an inventory management system using Visual C#, MySQL, and WPF for training and skill development platforms.

items.title: Avatar-based Chat using LLMs
items.description: A system integrating a real-time 3D avatar service with speech-to-text conversion and GPT-4 on domain-specific data, enabling an interactive conversation experience.

items.title: Insyte-O (Gen AI-based Maintenance Management)
items.description: Led a team of five to develop an intelligent maintenance management solution for automating requests, work orders, and planning in manufacturing, leveraging AWS Bedrock, Claude, AWS Neptune, and more.

items.title: WPE (Work Posture Assessment)
items.description: Developed software that calculates ergonomic scores from video inputs, using Python, OpenCV, and AWS to analyze angles between joints for a physiotherapist-approved posture score.

items.title: MFGIIOT (Manufacturing Intelligent IoT)
items.description: Implemented real-time data collection and analytics for manufacturing plants using AWS Quicksight, DynamoDB, S3, AWS IoT Sitewise, Ignition, and MQTT to drive smarter shopfloor monitoring.
